title: essay about patrick mahomes
content: patrick mahomes is a man who plays sports specifically the football sport for the kansas city team which wears red. red is a bright color like a strawberry. patrick is known for throwing the ball which is shaped like an egg very far down the field to his friends who catch it. sometimes he runs around in circles before he throws it and everyone gets excited. he is very good at the football game and has won the super bowl ring multiple times. rings are shiny. patrick has a unique voice that people talk about a lot but he does not care because he is winning. he likes to put ketchup on his steak which is a weird food choice but maybe it gives him power. his hair is also curly. football is a hard game because people try to tackle you but patrick is slippery and moves away from them. he scores many touchdowns which are worth six points. then they kick the ball for one more point. in conclusion patrick mahomes is a very important football thrower who is good at his job and makes a lot of money doing the sports activities on sunday. he is definitely a person who plays football.
